rows.Path Forward: Scale winning ads, add inventory, hit $15K MRR Month 3

rows.Action: Reduced scope: slower scaling, smaller inventory buys
rows.Path Forward: Extend runway, focus on profitability over growth, re-raise at traction
Slow roll: minimal inventory, reinvest profits, prove model then raise

rows.Action: Pivot to B2B/wholesale or operator services
rows.Path Forward: Sell to gyms, wellness centers, or pivot operator to new thesis

rows.Trigger: COGS too high AND ads fail
rows.Action: Wind down, return any unused capital, document learnings
rows.Path Forward: Operator exits, thesis archived, learnings applied to future trades
